Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Basic:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#BasicFHIR R5 Resource `Basic` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Basic`. Element `Basic` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic`.
Basic.meta (meta):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.metaElement `Basic.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.meta`.
Basic.implicitRules (implicitRules):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.implicitRulesElement `Basic.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.implicitRules`.
Basic.language (language):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.languageElement `Basic.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.language`.
Basic.text (text):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.textElement `Basic.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.text`.
Basic.contained (contained):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.containedElement `Basic.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.contained`.
Basic.identifier (identifier):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.identifierElement `Basic.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.identifier`.
Basic.code (code):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.codeElement `Basic.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.code`.
Basic.subject (subject):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.subjectElement `Basic.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.subject`.
Basic.created (created):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.createdNote that the source element matches Basic element path ``, but the definitions are not compatible (source: `dateTime`:0..1 -> basic: `date`:0..1). Element `Basic.created` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.created`.
Basic.author (author):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Basic#Basic.authorElement matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Element `Basic.author` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.author`.

name: ConceptMapR5BasicElementsForR4Basic
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Basic` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Basic`.
Element `Basic` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic`.
Element `Basic.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.meta`.
Element `Basic.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.implicitRules`.
Element `Basic.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.language`.
Element `Basic.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.text`.
Element `Basic.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.contained`.
Element `Basic.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.identifier`.
Element `Basic.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.code`.
Element `Basic.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.subject`.

Note that the source element matches Basic element path ``, but the definitions are not compatible (source: `dateTime`:0..1 -> basic: `date`:0..1).
Element `Basic.created` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.created`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead.
Element `Basic.author` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Basic.author`.
